verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609>. When the LORD<WH3068> turned again<WH7725> the captivity<WH7870> of Zion<WH6726>, we were like them that dream<WH2492>.

Then was our mouth<WH6310> filled<WH4390> with laughter<WH7814>, and our tongue<WH3956> with singing<WH7440>: then said<WH559> they among the heathen<WH1471>, The LORD<WH3068> hath done<WH6213> great things<WH1431> for them.
The LORD<WH3068> hath done<WH6213> great things<WH1431> for us; whereof we are glad<WH8056>.
Turn again<WH7725> our captivity<WH7622><WH7622>, O LORD<WH3068>, as the streams<WH650> in the south<WH5045>.
They that sow<WH2232> in tears<WH1832> shall reap<WH7114> in joy<WH7440>.

He that goeth<WH3212> forth<WH1980> and weepeth<WH1058>, bearing<WH5375> precious<WH4901> seed<WH2233>, shall doubtless<WH935> come<WH935> again with rejoicing<WH7440>, bringing<WH5375> his sheaves<WH485> with him.
